narrative.narrative: Aeroenlaces Nacionales, S.A. de C.V., trading as VivaAerobus.com, is a Mexican low cost airline part-owned by the founders of Europe's biggest low-cost carrier, Ryanair and the biggest bus company group in Mexico, IAMSA. It has its corporate headquarters in the Cargo Zone of Terminal C on the grounds of General Mariano Escobedo International Airport in Apodaca, Nuevo León.
